extensionDescription.message: This add-on works blocking Web Push notifications from Web sites.

works.message: Tired of receiving page notifications or being bothered by them asking permission to send notifications? Don't bother with that anymore! The nBother add-on works by blocking the operation of Web Push notifications, and can be activated in the toolbar by clicking on the shield icon, when it is green it is turned on and red turned off. The add-on starts by default enabled on mobile devices you do not need to open the Add-ons Manager to activate it.

resources.message: The Add-on currently has the following features:

resources2.message: 2. Enables and disables receiving Web Push notifications (Desktop)

resources3.message: 3. Reloads the page to change the configuration after clicking the Add-on icon (Desktop)

note.message: Note: This Add-on is completely free! Please consider make a small donation or write an review at addons.mozilla.org. Thank you!
